welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Little Lever, a charming town known for its picturesque scenery and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourselves in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops and restaurants, serving mainly European and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and charter flights to popular holiday destinations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
